mapper.select: select br.no ,br.title ,us.name ,br.hit ,to_char(br.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,br.user_no as user_no from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no order by br.no desc

select br.no ,br.title ,us.name ,br.hit ,to_char(br.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,br.user_no as user_no from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by br.no desc

select br.no ,br.title ,us.name ,br.hit ,to_char(br.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,br.user_no as user_no from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no
and (br.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or us.name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
order by br.no desc
select br.no ,br.title ,us.name ,br.hit ,to_char(br.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,br.user_no as user_no ,br.content from board br, users us where br.user_no = us.no and br.no = #{no}
